response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Our product offers unparalleled benefits that align perfectly with your business needs, making it an indispensable asset for your company.

Considering its exceptional value and the unique features it brings to the table, we are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,500,000, and we are confident that it will provide substantial returns on investment for your business.

Please let us know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. We are more than happy to arrange a personalized presentation tailored to your specific requirements.

Looking forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve your esteemed company.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
